languages.text: Ranged attacks decrease target's AP by 2 up for 1 round.

languages.text: This creature's ranged attacks reduce the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} by −2 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
